metadata.name: Devotion
metadata.description:
Devotion
Image taken during the Good Friday ceremony. 

(Holy week 2018, Ayacucho, Peru.)

-----

About the collection:

The Quechua word 'Tiyapuy' expresses a sense of belonging to a certain place. That's what I felt while doing this project between 2017 and 2019 in Pomabamba, a little town in the Peruvian Andes, at the Ayacucho Region. These pictures are part of my exploration of the place while getting attached to it day by day. People I met, their culture, their religiosity, and some situations I encountered with.

Taken on 120 film 6x6.

Important note:
50% of the profits from this collection will be given among the locals of Pomabamba or the people portrayed in certain images.
